name: Carrying A Microwave Down 3rd Ave
description:
A 2-minute tone poem about hell.

Made in 72 hours for #LDJAM49 with a smartphone, Ren'Py, and my new microwave.

UPDATE 10/7/21: I heard some people on Macs have had trouble playing it. I added a new Mac-only distribution which should hopefully work! After unzipping it, you will likely need to right-click (or CTRL + click) to open it.
